lines.text: There's something I can't figure out...
What's that?
I don't know.
Why'd you kill her you bastard?!
Get off my case motherfucker!

The following feature is one of the most violent films ever made. There are at least two dozen scenes of barbaric torture and sadistic cruelty graphically shown. If the presentation of disgusting and repulsive subject matter upsets you, please do not view this film.
Why couldn't we have made it Acupulco, instead of this poison paradise?
All you would have found there would have been white widows.
Want some?
No, I don't drink. This here is my speed.
Cocaine?
Want some?
Wanna know something? I had you nailed down the minute I saw you.
Oh you did? What, that I'm a little whore?
All the way. A hot-pussied little whore, who arrived down here looking for freedom, a victim of Puritanical breeding, seeking release for strange new feelings.
Oh God, please let her die soon. Oh, let her die soon. And let me die soon too, please.
What a wasted vacation.
And maybe our lives too.
Yeah...

[Pat runs to eat a piece of meat]
No! Stop! It might be Rudy!
Hey, bitch, where's your stud?

[Looking at a corpse]
Who was he?
Tim Barrett. A user and occasional pusher. He was released from a turkey truck just this morning.
Yeah? How long had he been there?
Five weeks. They thought he'd made it over the hump.
Yeah? Well he has now.
Lt. Rizzo. 17th Precinct. I'd like you to come with me.
But I can't to that now. I'm working!
So am I.
You could have ended up on a slab also. Then we'd have TWO murders instead of ONE, thanks to your precious Mike Logan.
But look, I...
Look, why were you tryin' to hide from me the fact, that Mike was your boyfriend? Are all you girls today so STUPID?
